metadata.verification_standards: All tags verified with public sources including court documents, news archives, Wikipedia, and official records. Minimum 2 sources per sensitive classification (especially 'Victim' tags).
metadata.privacy_note: Victim tags assigned ONLY to publicly self-identified individuals or those who testified publicly. Anonymous victims excluded to respect privacy.
data_sources: Major news outlets (NYT, WSJ, CNN, BBC, NBC)

jeffrey_epstein.name: Jeffrey Epstein
jeffrey_epstein.notes: Convicted sex trafficker and financier. Primary subject of investigation.

ghislaine_maxwell.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
ghislaine_maxwell.notes: Convicted of sex trafficking in connection with Epstein. Former socialite and daughter of Robert Maxwell.

sarah_kellen.name: Sarah Kellen
sarah_kellen.verification: Court documents, 2008 non-prosecution agreement, media investigations
sarah_kellen.notes: Longtime assistant to Epstein. Named as potential co-conspirator, granted immunity. Claims to be victim herself.

emmy_tayler.name: Emmy Tayler
emmy_tayler.verification: Court filings, defamation lawsuit settlement with HarperCollins
emmy_tayler.notes: Personal assistant to Maxwell 1997-2001. British actress. Successfully challenged false allegations through legal action.

larry_visoski.name: Larry Visoski
larry_visoski.verification: Maxwell trial testimony (2021), CNN and NBC coverage
larry_visoski.notes: Chief pilot for Epstein's private jets for 28 years (1991-2019). Known as 'Captain Bigdawg'. Key witness at Maxwell trial.

william_clinton.name: William Clinton
william_clinton.verification: Flight logs, Wikipedia, official statements, House Oversight subpoena (2025)
william_clinton.notes: 42nd President. Flew on Epstein's plane multiple times 2002-2003 for humanitarian trips. Denies wrongdoing and knowledge of crimes.

donald_trump.name: Donald Trump
donald_trump.verification: Flight logs (7 flights 1993-1997), public statements, Wikipedia, multiple news sources
donald_trump.notes: 45th and 47th President. Social relationship with Epstein 1980s-2000s. Claims falling out around 2007. No allegations of wrongdoing.

leon_black.name: Leon Black
leon_black.verification: Senate investigation (2023-2025), Apollo board review, Wikipedia, Bloomberg
leon_black.notes: Apollo Global Management co-founder. Paid Epstein $170 million for tax advice (2012-2017). Resigned from Apollo and MoMA. Settled with USVI AG for $62 million.

glenn_dubin.name: Glenn Dubin
glenn_dubin.verification: Court documents, Wikipedia, Harvard Crimson investigation
glenn_dubin.notes: Billionaire hedge fund manager (Highbridge Capital). Wife Eva dated Epstein in 1980s. Epstein was godfather to children. Denied Giuffre allegations.

alan_dershowitz.name: Alan Dershowitz
alan_dershowitz.verification: Wikipedia, court records, defamation lawsuit settlement (2022)
alan_dershowitz.notes: Harvard Law professor, constitutional lawyer. Member of Epstein's 2008 legal defense team. Alleged by Giuffre, who later recanted. Lawsuit settled 2022.

jeanluc_brunel.name: Jean-Luc Brunel
jeanluc_brunel.verification: Wikipedia, NBC coverage, French court records
jeanluc_brunel.notes: French modeling agent. Founded MC2 Model Management with Epstein financing. Arrested 2020 on trafficking charges. Died by suicide in jail 2022.

doug_band.name: Doug Band
doug_band.verification: Wikipedia, flight logs (26 flights), Fox News coverage
doug_band.notes: Former top advisor to Bill Clinton, co-founded Teneo. Flew on Epstein's plane 26 times. Claims he warned Clinton about Epstein. No allegations.

kevin_spacey.name: Kevin Spacey
kevin_spacey.verification: Flight logs (2002 Africa trip), public statements, news coverage
kevin_spacey.notes: Academy Award-winning actor. Participated in 2002 Africa AIDS charity trip with Clinton. Stated he didn't know Epstein. No Epstein-related allegations.

naomi_campbell.name: Naomi Campbell
naomi_campbell.verification: Black book, flight logs, unsealed documents, public statements
naomi_campbell.notes: Supermodel. Appeared in black book and flight logs. Denied knowledge of crimes, expressed disgust at Epstein's actions. No allegations.

marvin_minsky.name: Marvin Minsky
marvin_minsky.verification: Wikipedia, Science magazine investigation, court documents (Giuffre allegation)
marvin_minsky.notes: MIT AI pioneer, Turing Award winner. Received $100K research grant from Epstein (2002). Organized symposia on Epstein's island. Alleged by Giuffre, denied by widow. Died 2016.

martin_nowak.name: Martin Nowak
martin_nowak.notes: Harvard professor. Program for Evolutionary Dynamics launched with $6.5M from Epstein (2003). Continued facilitating meetings after Epstein's conviction.

alec_baldwin.name: Alec Baldwin
alec_baldwin.notes: Actor. Appeared in Epstein's contact book. No allegations or evidence of wrongdoing. Being in black book does not indicate culpability.

michael_jackson.name: Michael Jackson
michael_jackson.notes: Musician (died 2009). Name appeared in Epstein documents. No allegations or evidence linking to crimes. Died 2009 before Epstein case became public.

mick_jagger.name: Mick Jagger
mick_jagger.notes: Rolling Stones frontman. Appeared in contact book. No allegations or evidence of wrongdoing.

ehud_barak.name: Ehud Barak
ehud_barak.notes: Former Prime Minister of Israel. Visited Epstein's Manhattan townhouse multiple times. No allegations of wrongdoing.

ralph_fiennes.name: Ralph Fiennes
ralph_fiennes.notes: Actor. Appeared in contact book. No allegations or evidence of wrongdoing.

courtney_love.name: Courtney Love
courtney_love.notes: Musician/actress. Appeared in contact book. No allegations or evidence of wrongdoing.

steven_pinker.name: Steven Pinker
steven_pinker.notes: Harvard psychology professor. Consulted on Epstein legal defense language (2007). Stated he was asked for linguistic advice on single statement.

david_koch.name: David Koch
david_koch.notes: Billionaire industrialist (died 2019). Appeared in contact book. No allegations or evidence of wrongdoing.

richard_branson.name: Richard Branson
richard_branson.notes: Virgin Group founder. Appeared in contact book. Released statement denying knowledge of crimes. No allegations.

important_notes: Being listed in Epstein's contact book or flight logs does NOT indicate wrongdoing or knowledge of crimes
Many celebrities and public figures had contact information in the black book without their knowledge
Flight log appearances often relate to legitimate charitable work (e.g., 2002 Africa AIDS trip)
Only 10 publicly self-identified victims are tagged as 'Victim' - 100+ additional victims remain anonymous by choice
Tags reflect documented roles/occupations, not allegations unless verified by court records
Multiple tags indicate multiple relevant roles (e.g., Dershowitz: Legal + Academic)
All 'Victim' tags verified through court testimony, public statements, or self-identification
No speculation or unverified claims included in any tags or notes

verification_methodology.Victim_tag: Assigned ONLY to individuals who: (1) testified publicly in court, (2) publicly self-identified in media interviews, or (3) filed public lawsuits. Anonymous victims excluded.
verification_methodology.Politician_tag: Current or former elected officials, government appointees, or royal family members
verification_methodology.Celebrity_tag: Entertainment industry figures including actors, musicians, models
verification_methodology.Legal_tag: Attorneys, judges, legal professionals involved in Epstein cases
verification_methodology.Financier_tag: Hedge fund managers, investment professionals, financial industry leaders
verification_methodology.Associate_tag: Known close personal or professional associates of Epstein/Maxwell

future_expansion.note: This index can be expanded to include additional entities from the full black book (1,740 contacts) and flight logs as research continues
priority_additions: Additional pilots and staff members from flight logs
